title: Spider-Girl / MC2 Pack
description:
The MC2 Universe was conceived by writer/editor Tom DeFalco as a possible alternate future for the Marvel Universe, which is set in the present day, with the first appearances of most Marvel heroes having taken place fifteen years earlier than in main continuity. The goal of the line was to produce comic books that were more accessible to a wider audience than MarvelÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s main line of books and weren't entrenched in years of continuity.  

Spider-Girl is May "Mayday" Parker, the child of Peter and Mary Jane Parker who develops versions of her father's Spider-powers when she is 15.  Mayday dons Ben Reilly's Spider-Man costume and decides to fight crime like her father before her.

A-Next, features a new team of Avengers who come together after the original Avengers disbanded.

J2 is the son of the Juggernaut, a heroic teenager.

Fantastic Five, features the expanded Fantastic Four.

Wild Thing is the daughter of Wolverine and Elektra.

Darkdevil is is the son of Ben Reilly, the clone of Spider-Man, infused with the powers of the demon Zarathos, the demon who was bound to Johnny Blaze to create Ghost Rider.

The Buzz is the grandson of J. Jonah Jameson who dons a 'Human Fly' body armor to fight crime.

American Dream is a young female teen who has taken on the mantle of Captain America.


Released on http://ComicPirates.info
